value:
Damn that Julia...$k$pDon't look at me like that! It's
infuriating. Leave!

How dare I hunt children? You
misunderstand. I was simply
educating my subjects...$k$pThe gifted ones, at any rate.

Snooping around again, are you?
Searching for a traitor in our midst,
perhaps?$k$pHeh heh. Merely a joke, I assure you.

Have some free time? Let's see...
That flower bed is just crawling with
bugs. Let's crush them all.

You know, if I get bored...I could tear
this castle stone from stone. Let's
hope you keep me entertained.

My name is Julius. I was forced
to visit this tedious hovel by
$Nf.

Hahaha! Think of the merriment
I'll make!
Good enough, I suppose.
Dull.

It seems you do understand how
to use power. I will gladly make
use of this.

I am Julius, Prince of Grannvale.
What a lively place you have here!
Good. I do so hate to be bored.

Why, hello,
$Nu!
Back from the slaughter?$k$pLet's talk about who you plan to crush
next. Tell me, what will you destroy?$k$pYou don't enjoy fighting, you say?
Don't play coy with me.$k$pYou must enjoy it. Down to the very,
very depths of your soul, I think...$k$pPeople live by taking from others—by
defeating them, do they not? Those
who don't fight aren't fit to live.$k$pHuman kindness? There you go
again, spouting nonsense. Surely you
don't really mean it!$k$pYou may say whatever you like now,
but you'll be forced to acknowledge
the truth sooner or later.$k$pAnd when you find out what lies
beyond all of the fighting... I'll be
waiting for you, a smile on my face.
ふん…
死ね
うああっ！
なんだと…
Your hope is gone!
To me, you're nothing.
I bring you death.
Blood will rain.
Gyaaah!
ふっ
Seliph is the Scion of Light? Ha! I suppose that makes me the Scion of Darkness!
You'd taunt me? Are you mad?
Julia is my sister. But I will kill her, oh yes.
I cannot stand the sight of Reinhardt. The next time he appears before me, he will die.
Gah! My head hurts. No, stay back, you!
She said that I was kind? Oh, Julia. You do spout nonsense.
I'll let you live... At least, for now.
Excellent.
What do you desire?
The game is on.
